## IModuleMinifierPluginHooks interface

Hooks provided by the ModuleMinifierPlugin

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IModuleMinifierPluginHooks
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                                           | Modifiers | Type                                                                                                                                          | Description                                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [finalModuleId](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.imoduleminifierpluginhooks.finalmoduleid.md)                     |           | SyncWaterfallHook&lt;string \| number \| undefined, webpack.compilation.Compilation&gt;                                                       | Hook invoked on a module id to get the final rendered id.                                                             |
| [postProcessCodeFragment](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.imoduleminifierpluginhooks.postprocesscodefragment.md) |           | SyncWaterfallHook&lt;ReplaceSource, [IPostProcessFragmentContext](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.ipostprocessfragmentcontext.md) &gt;      | Hook invoked on code after it has been returned from the minifier.                                                    |
| [rehydrateAssets](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.imoduleminifierpluginhooks.rehydrateassets.md)                 |           | AsyncSeriesWaterfallHook&lt;[IDehydratedAssets](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.idehydratedassets.md) , webpack.compilation.Compilation&gt; | Hook invoked at the start of optimizeChunkAssets to rehydrate the minified boilerplate and runtime into chunk assets. |
